name: Babes in Toyland
quote: “Now we’re talking…” “Not THOSE kind of babes!”
title: Stocking

name: Bad Santa
quote: “Ho freakin’ ho!”
abilities: 'Young’ Characters in the same Movie as Bad Santa get -1 DS and Bad Santa gets +1 DS for each ‘Female’ in the same Movie.
title: Love

name: Crippled Kid Who Provides Pathos
quote: “No, really, I can wheel myself – it’s just my six brothers and sisters I worry about.”
abilities: The “Selfish Rich Guy” cannot Attack a Movie with the Crippled Kid.
title: Eggnog

name: Department Store Santa
quote: “Everything you need is in aisle 4”
abilities: When he is played, declare whether he is ‘Nice’ or ‘Naughty’.
title: Chestnuts

name: Disaster-Prone Father
quote: “Now, if I can fit only one more plug…”
abilities: Anyone can play a Prop on him but any positive DS values become negative DS values. (So a +3 Prop becomes a -3.)
title: Dreidle

name: Drunk Who Reforms and Becomes Santa
quote: “Holy cow, my bottle of scotch turned into a bag filled with toys. It’s a Christmas miracle!”
abilities: You may play more than one Prop on him each turn. He may give any of your Characters more than one Prop per turn.
title: Give

name: Dutiful Wife
quote: “My mother had not had a hot meal for herself in 15 years.”
abilities: Sacrifice her to prevent any other Character in your Movie from being removed.
title: Channukah

name: Guy Who Finds His Christmas Spirit
quote: “I’m worth more dead than… look, snow. It’s a Christmas miracle.”
abilities: If he is in your Movie when the game is over he is worth an extra 5 points.
title: Bloody

name: Kid Who’s Left Alone for Christmas
quote: “Maybe I should speak up more”
abilities: The “Inept Burglars” cannot succeed in an Attack against a Movie with this kid.
title: Gift

name: Kris Kringle
quote: “Kris Kringle, Santa Claus, St. Nick, Father Christmas…, this guy’s got more aliases than a mobster in the witness protection program.”
abilities: Counts as a “Santa” Character.
title: North

name: Little Drummer Boy
quote: “Stop beating that drum, you’re keeping the baby awake!”
title: Kris Kringle

name: Misfit Toys
quote: “Nobody wants us.”
abilities: You may play this Character in another player’s Movie.
title: Ride

name: Mrs. Claus
quote: “’Marry me and we’ll hear the pitter-patter of little feet.’ he says. What he didn’t tell me was it comes from 150 freakin’ elves.”
abilities: Defense = 8 if there is a “Santa” Character in your Movie.
title: Chipmunks

name: Oppressed Working Stiff
quote: “And I want those files on my desk by noon, Dec 25th! By the way, Merry Christmas!”
abilities: If the “Selfish Rich Guy” Attack succeeds against this Movie, the Working Stiff must be chosen as the victim.
title: Fat

name: Orphan in the Snow
quote: “Please, sir, may I have galoshes?”
abilities: When this card is played, declare whether the Orphan is ‘Male’ or ‘Female’.
title: Roasting

name: Overly Regimented Mother
quote: “Guests arrive 2:30, dinner at 4:30, dessert at 6, and everyone out at 8.”
abilities: All other ‘Family’ Characters in the same Movie gain +1 DS.
title: Slay

name: Reindeer with a Useful Deformity
quote: “Look, does it really matter how I fly? You got presents to deliver and I need a job.”
title: Sleigh

name: Sexy Department Store Elves
quote: “Gives, ‘ho, ho, ho’ a new meaning, doesn’t it?”
abilities: All “Santas” in their Movie gain +1 DS.
title: Saves

name: Singing  Snowman
quote: “Merry Birthday!”
abilities: All ‘Young’ Characters in the Snowman’s Movie get +1 DS.
title: Fire

name: Skeletal Santa
quote: “But you’re the Pumpkin King!” “Not anymore.”
abilities: When Skeletal Santa is played, all other “Santa” characters in that Movie must be discarded. No other “Santa” Characters can be played into a Movie with the Skeletal Santa.
title: St. Nick

name: Skippy the Wonder Christmas Puppy
quote: “What’s that Skippy?” “You pooped in the box?”
abilities: May not use Props.
title: Presents

name: Talking Woodland Creatures
quote: “Where did you guys learn English?” “English? Are you sure you are not talking Squirrel?”
abilities: Sacrifice the Woodland Creatures to stop another Character from being removed for any reason.
title: One-Horse

name: The Good Henchman of an Evil Master
quote: “Hey, I needed the dental plan.”
abilities: You may discard the Good Henchman from your Movie to stop any Creature Attack.
title: Versus

name: Three Wise Men
quote: “If we were so wise, we would have told him to order take out for the last supper!”
abilities: When you play the Three Wise Men from your hand, you must give one card to each player or you cannot play this card.
title: Haunt

name: Toymaking Elves
quote: “Dude, can you introduce me to Legolas?” “I’m not that kind of elf.”
abilities: Defense = 4 if you have a “Santa” in your Movie.
title: Lights

name: Abominable Snowman
quote: “Somehow the name ‘Bumbles’ doesn’t strike fear in the hearts of men.”
abilities: If the defender defeats this Creature, he gets to keep it as a 5 DS ‘Nice’ Character in his Movie.
title: Gremlins

name: Christmas Carolers
quote: “How can I enjoy a Silent Night with you jerks singing on my lawn?”
abilities: Can only attack a Movie with a Location. If their Attack succeeds, instead of removing a Character, the Player loses a turn.
title: Forest

name: Cranky Old Spinster
quote: “My family has been living here since the dinosaurs.”
abilities: Attack Strength = 9 vs. Movies with ‘Young’ Characters.
title: Pumpkin

name: Elves Gone Bad
quote: “Man, every movie we’re in we’re playing psychotic elves or leprechauns.” “Yeah, but it pays the bills.”
abilities: AS = 12 when Attacking the “North Pole.”
title: March

name: Evil Landlord
quote: “If I don’t get the rent by December 24th, you will be evicted! By the way, Merry Christmas.”
abilities: If his Attack succeeds, he evicts a Character and he may also remove the Location.
title: Office

name: Furry Green Guy Who Hates Christmas
quote: “Boris Karloff was soooooo much better.”
abilities: For each Prop discarded from hand or play you reduce his Attack by the value of the Prop discarded.
title: Muppet

name: Ghost of Christmas Future
quote: “Didn’t I see this guy in a Bergman film?”
abilities: If this Ghost succeeds in an Attack, you also get to look at the top 5 cards from the Draw pile. You may place any of those cards on the bottom and the remaining cards back on top in any order.
title: Yuletide

name: Ghost of Christmas Past
quote: “Did I really have a mullet back then?” “Wait, it get’s worse.”
abilities: This Ghost ignores the Location in a Movie it is attacking. (The Location’s DS value does not contribute to the defense of the Movie.)
title: Die

name: Ghost of Christmas Present
quote: “Don’t get your hopes up, “present” means now. You’re not getting any loot.”
abilities: Choose one Prop to ignore in the Movie being attacked. (That Prop does not contribute to the defense of the Movie.)
title: Hard

name: Gremlins
quote: “They’re everywhere!”
abilities: Can be played as SFX to remove a Prop from play.
title: Evil

name: Inept Burglars
quote: “We’d gotten past alarms, deadbolts and motion sensors. Who knew the best security system would be a six year old kid!”
abilities: Anyone may discard a Prop from their hand to fail their Attack. If they succeed, they do not remove a Character but you get all the Props from the target Movie to place on your Characters.
title: Angel

name: Jack Frost
quote: “I’m nipping at your nose… and going down.”
abilities: AS = 20 vs. a Movie that contains the “Singing Snowman”.
title: Street

name: Killer Toys
quote: “They’re cute… if you don’t mind getting stabbed.”
title: Demon

name: Martians That Want to Kidnap Christmas
quote: “When I was a kid, I wanted a molecular decomposer but everyone said I’d shoot my ocular receptacle out.”
abilities: If their Attack succeeds, they must remove a ‘Santa’ if there is one.
title: Toy

name: Military Toy Maker
quote: “Every child will want a toy that comes with 50 caliber guns.”
abilities: Can be played with “Killer Toys” and “Killer Misfit Toys.”
title: Candy

name: Nutcracker
quote: “Don’t even go there!”
abilities: Always succeeds “Under the Christmas Tree.”
title: Tree

name: Overly Commercial Executive
quote: “And we’ll put Santa’s face on all the condoms. It will give new meaning to ‘Christmas Stockings.’”
abilities: If his Attack succeeds, you don’t remove any Characters but you can refill your hand to 6 cards.
title: Party

name: Rabid Reindeer
quote: “I’m tired of flying and I’m tired of snow! And don’t those elves look delish?”
title: Mistletoe

name: Selfish Rich Guy
quote: “Bah, it’s not my fault you were born poor.”
abilities: Attack Strength = 12 vs. Movies with at least one ‘Family’ Character.
title: Pie

name: Silent… but Deadly Night
quote: “It’s pretty quiet here… I think we’re in serious trouble.”
abilities: This card can be combined with another Creature card.
title: Cane

name: Thief Dressed Up as Santa Claus
quote: “Santa, why are you taking back all our presents?” “Well kid, we just found out the elves were using lead paint.”
abilities: If the Thief succeeds in an attack, instead of killing a Character, he steals all the Props from the attacked Movie and discards them.
title: Claws

name: … Up on the Rooftop
quote: “You think they would shovel the roof – it’s not like they don’t know I’m coming.”
abilities: All “Santa” Characters gain -1 DS while on the Rooftop.
title: Holly

name: 34th Street
quote: “There’s a whole gaggle of Santas over here.”
abilities: The “Department Store Santa” gains +4 DS while at this Location. All other “Santa” characters gain +1 DS.
title: Town

name: Candy Cane Forest
quote: “Forget wild animal bites, you can get diabetes just from walking through here!”
title: Bell

name: City Park
quote: “Many a person has gone on the naughty list strolling through this park.”
title: Scrooge

name: Island of Misfit Toys
quote: “How come I can’t find this place on any map?” “See, even the world doesn’t want us.”
abilities: Defense = +5 if you have “Misfit Toys” at this Location.
title: Coming

name: Multi-National Corporate HQ
quote: “Due to budget cuts, you’ve been laid off. By the way, Merry Christmas.”
abilities: Defense = -5 vs. the “Overly Commercial Executive” and the “Selfish Rich Guy.”
title: Merry

name: Mystical Shoppe in the Back Alley with the Perfect Christmas Present
quote: “Wow! You can’t buy those in Wal-Mart!”
abilities: 'Supernatural’ Creatures cannot attack a movie with this location.
title: Bad

name: North Pole
quote: “Why does the North Pole have to be so far up north?”
abilities: Defense = +7 if you have a “Santa” character at this Location.
title: City

name: Quaint Little Town
quote: “Welcome to Bedford Falls!”
abilities: All ‘Family’ Characters gain +1 DS while in the Town.
title: Nutcracker

name: South Pole
quote: “Sigh. If only we can convince Santa to relocate down here.”
title: Martians

name: Toy Store
quote: “It’s like Christmas for a kid… oh wait, it is Christmas.”
abilities: All ‘Young’ Characters at this Location gain +2 DS.
title: Conquers

name: Toyland
quote: “It looks like a 4 year old’s bedroom but with less toys.”
abilities: “Killer Toys” always succeeds in Toyland.
title: Babes

name: Under the Christmas Tree
quote: “Don’t open until Christmas morning!”
abilities: On your turn, you may place one card from your hand under this card. When the game is over, you score +1 point for each card under here. Should this Location be removed from play so will all cards under it.
title: Hobo

name: Workshop at the North Pole
quote: “Who’d ever thought you could have a sweatshop in a place that’s so damn cold?!”
abilities: Each of your Characters can get 2 Props a turn.
title: Suit

name: Action Figure
quote: “For such a little guy, he sure does make many kids happy.”
abilities: Defense = +4 in the hands of a ‘Naughty’ Character.
title: Holiday

name: Christmas Lights
quote: “It’s the most wonderful time of the year… for the power company.”
abilities: Play only on a Location. Defense = +4 during the “Christmas Light Wars”.
title: Woman

name: Eggnog
quote: “A spirited way to get your drunk on.”
abilities: You may play this on an opponent’s Character. At any time you may remove the Eggnog to give the Character a printed DS of 0 until the end of the turn.
title: Black

name: Fruitcake
quote: “It can kill you in two ways – throwing it or eating it.”
abilities: Characters with the ‘Nice’ Trait may use this Prop.
title: Home

name: Leg Lamp
quote: “It’s Italian!”
abilities: All Characters with the Trait ‘Family’ in the same Movie have their printed DS reduced by 1.
title: Ice

name: Lump of Coal
quote: “Maybe in a few thousand years it will be worth something” “Not a good return on being naughty.”
abilities: Can be played on an opponent’s Character. This Prop may not be moved off a Character except by a SFX or removal of the Character.
title: Man

name: Milk and Cookies
quote: “And people wonder why I’m fat.”
abilities: Defense = +5 on “Santa” Characters.
title: Kid

name: Mini Van
quote: “I can fit Santa and all his presents in here.”
title: Vacation

name: One-Horse Sleigh
quote: “Sure it’s only one horsepower but it gets great mileage.”
abilities: Defense = +8 on a “Santa” Character.
title: Alone

name: Pink Bunny Suit
quote: “Is this a Christmas present or an Easter present?”
abilities: Can only be played on an opponent’s Character.
title: Perfect

name: Presents
quote: “Screw peace on earth and good will towards men – I want my loot!”
abilities: Your hand size is 7 while this Prop is on one of your Characters.
title: Stole

name: Red Ryder Pump Action BB Gun
quote: “Well, damn, I really did shoot my eye out”
abilities: Play as a SFX to remove a ‘Young’ Character from play.
title: Grinch

name: Relatives
quote: “They’re like an albatross around my neck.”
abilities: Can only be played on an opponent’s Character. Gives the Trait ‘Family’ to the Character saddled with them.
title: Polar

name: Santa Suit
quote: “I’m sorry, but it doesn’t come in a size 4”
abilities: Any Character wearing the Santa Suit is considered a “Santa” Character.
title: Express

name: Secret Decoder Ring
quote: “Buy more Z-Man Games’? Crap, it’s a damn commercial!”
abilities: Defense = +5 on a ‘Young’ Character.
title: White

name: Sickly Little Christmas Tree
quote: “Dude, your balls are drooping.”
abilities: Defense = the number of Characters in its Movie.
title: Frost

name: Token Dreidel
quote: “It’s tough being a Jew on Christmas.”
abilities: When you play the Dreidel, flip over the top card of the Draw Pile. The Dreidel’s Defense equals the AS or DS of the card flipped (place it under the Dreidel to remind you). SFX and ‘Roll the Credits’ count as 0 and are not placed under the Dreidel.
title: Bishop

name: Toy Train Set
quote: “For a toy that goes in circles it sure gets in the way of everything.”
abilities: This Prop does not attach to anything. When you play this card or if it is in your Movie at the start of your turn, pass the Train to the player on your left. That player may discard a card to pass it to their left, and so on, until someone chooses not to discard, in which case it stays in that player’s Movie until their turn.
title: Spirit

name: Roll The Credits
quote: “Well, we opened our presents, so it must be over.”
title: Secret

name: Roll The Credits
quote: “The little kid said “God bless us all” so it must be over.”
title: Ornament

name: A Merry Monster Christmas
quote: “A Severed arm, just what I’ve always wanted.”
abilities: All Creature Attacks are doubled until the beginning of your next turn.
title: Reindeer

name: Bad Presents
quote: “A pink bunny suit?!?!”
abilities: Play on a Prop to reduce its printed DS to +0.
title: Mrs. Claus

name: Bah! Humbug!
quote: “I hope you all die and go to hell. And by the way, Merry Christmas.”
abilities: Stop any card as it is being played. It goes back to that player’s hand and cannot be played again this turn.
title: Elf

name: Child Actors
quote: “Where did the kid go?” “The law says we can only work the little buggers a few hours a day.”
abilities: Remove all ‘Young’ Characters from all opponent’s Movies.
title: Carols

name: Christmas Decoration Wars
quote: “You can see our neighborhood from Mars.”
abilities: Compare the values of all Locations: the one with the highest value wins and stays in play while all the others are removed from play. Players may play SFX that increase or decrease the value of the Locations.
title: Claus

name: Christmas is for Kids
quote: “...and for toy store owners.”
abilities: All ‘Young’ Characters in a Movie gain +1 DS until the end of the turn.
title: Frosty

name: Christmas Light Mishap
quote: “Did you really have to use the street lamp as part of your decorations?”
abilities: Play on a Location to change its printed DS to -10. The Player may skip their turn to remove this card or discard “Christmas Decoration Wars” to remove it.
title: Cosmic

name: Christmas Miracle
quote: “It’s a miracle I survived the other 364 days.”
abilities: Stop any effect that removes a Character, even a successful Attack.
title: Rudolph

name: Closed For The Holidays
quote: “Pass up first crack at all those kids with their Christmas money burning a hole in their pocket?!”
abilities: Remove a Location from play.
title: 34th Street

name: Deadly Mistletoe
quote: “Smooch… gurgle… GAK”
abilities: Target a Movie that has a ‘Male’ and ‘Female’ Character in it and remove both cards.
title: Christmas

name: Dinner with the Family
quote: “It’s as brutal as a boxing match, but instead of 15 rounds it’s 7 courses.”
abilities: All your ‘Family’ Characters gain +1 DS while they remain in play OR stop one Creature Attack.
title: Deck

name: Double Dog Dare
quote: “Come on! I double dog dare you!”
abilities: Call odd or even, flip over the top card of the Draw Pile and count the letters in the title. If you are right you get to keep the card. If you are wrong the card is given to th player to your left. A “Roll the Credits” card is considered even.
title: Drummer

name: Everytime a Bell Rings an Angel Gets Its Wings
quote: “That’s why they have bells in church steeples - its like an angel xerox machine.”
abilities: Say ‘Ding!’ and remove a Character from any Movie and discard it’s Props (if any). That Character becomes a “Guardian Angel” Prop and is placed on any Character in the same Movie. The DS of the Angel is added to the Character it watches over as a bonus.
title: Silent

name: Fake Snow
quote: “This is supposed to be the North Pole – why is there a cactus in the background?!”
abilities: Play on a Location to reduce its printed DS to 0.
title: Deadly

name: FFFFFudge…
quote: “…but I didn’t say ‘Fudge’, I said…”
abilities: Play on a ‘Young’ Character to reduce its printed DS to 0 while it remains in play. OR you may change a Character’s ‘Nice’ Trait to ‘Naughty.’
title: Life

name: Grandma Got Run Over By a Reindeer
quote: “I guess she didn’t see the reindeer crossing sign.”
abilities: Remove an ‘Old’ Character from play.
title: Story

name: He Sees You When You’re Sleeping, He Knows When You’re Awake
quote: “Evidently, Santa hasn’t heard about the new anti-stalking laws.”
abilities: Play on a “Santa” Character to make it attack the Movie is is in. Its AS equals its total DS.
title: Snow

name: I Saw Mommy Kissing Santa Claus
quote: “Does that get you on the ‘Nice List’ or the ‘Naughty List’?” “Depends on how you do it.”
abilities: Play on a ‘Female’ Character to give her +2 DS OR +4 DS while there is a “Santa” Character in her Movie.
title: Pole

name: It’s Better to Give Than to Receive
quote: “Maybe when it comes to the flu, but I’d rather have the loot.”
abilities: You may give cards in your hand to other players. For every card given bank 1 point at the end of the game.
title: Snowman

name: It’s the Thought That Counts
quote: “So what if it is a hand me down…”
abilities: Take any Prop out of the Discard Pile and place it on any Character. Any positive DS values on the Prop become negative DS values. (So a +2 becomes -2).
title: Clause

name: Jingle Ball
quote: “It’s a costume party and everyone is dressed as an elf!”
abilities: Shuffle all Characters in play and deal them to each player giving them the same amount of Characters they had prior to the Ball. Players can place any Props they had prior to the Ball on any Characters they now have.
title: Ball

name: Last Minute Shopping
quote: “Holy Cow, I forgot to get something for Billy!”
abilities: Flip over the top 6 cards from the Draw Pile and spread them onto the table. When you say ‘shop’ each play slaps their hand down on top of one card. When all hands are on the table, the players get the card they slapped. If there is a contested card, (more than one hand on it) the player whose hand is on the bottom gets the card.
title: Red-Nosed

name: Last Toy on the Shelf
quote: “I… (oof) saw it… (ack) FIRST!!!”
abilities: Choose a Character with only one Prop and a Character you control. Your Character (DS = AS) attacks that Character (using his total DS without a Location) and the winner gets the Prop. You may only use SFX during this attack.
title: Nightmare

name: Nativity Scene
quote: “You know, with a fresh coat of paint, a floor lamp over by that stall, and a sofa next to the sheep, this place could be a pretty homey manger.”
abilities: Double or halve (round down) the DS of a Location until the end of the turn.
title: Before

name: Naughty List
quote: “Wow, you’ve been REALLY naughty this year!” “How can you tell?” “You’re on the list twice.”
abilities: Search the Draw Pile then the Discard Pile for the “Lump of Coal” and place it on a Character.
title: T’was

name: Nice List
quote: “A sweater?! How lame! I worked my freaking butt off to get on the nice list and all I get is a SWEATER?!”
abilities: Search the Draw Pile for any Prop and add it to your Movie. If there are no Props in the Draw Pile then take the top Prop off the Discard Pile.
title: Night

name: Preachy Monologue That Reminds Everyone Christmas is All About
quote: “...and that’s the true meaning of Christmas. And now a word from our sponsor.”
abilities: Give all your Characters +1 DS until the end of the turn.
title: Yes, Virginia

name: Santa Claus is Coming to Town
quote: “Trust me, you don’t want to be standing underneath those reindeer when they’re flying overhead!”
abilities: Play on a Location in a Movie that has a “Santa” Character. As long as there is a “Santa” Character in that Movie the Location’s Defense = +8.
title: South

name: Santa Claus vs. Jesus
quote: “I’m the true meaning of Christmas!” “No, I am!”
abilities: Play this card to remove all “Santa” Characters from play OR each player draws 2 cards starting with the current player and going clockwise.
title: Tale

name: Scrooged
quote: “Dude, you got scrooged!”
abilities: Force an opponent to discard all but one card from their hand.
title: Family

name: Star of Bethlehem
quote: “’Follow the Star’ he says. ‘It’ll lead you to the King of Kings’ he says. So how did I wind up in a manger, knee deep in four different kinds of animal poop?”
abilities: Look through the Discard Pile and take any Location and place it in your Movie. If you currently have a Location it is replaced.
title: Girl

name: Stuck in a Chimney
quote: “What’s that smell?” “It sure ain’t Christmas spirit!”
abilities: Remove a “Santa” Character from play OR add +5 AS to a Creature Attack.
title: Boy

name: The Greatest Story Ever Told
quote: “Are you kidding, this doesn’t hold a candle to ‘Dark Knight’!”
abilities: Can only be played as the first card on your turn. Remove all the cards in your Movie and bank the points.
title: Miracle

name: The Santa Clause
quote: “The great part of the job is I only work one day a year. The bad part is I spend nine months negotiating the contract.”
abilities: Stop and “Santa” Character from being removed from play OR cancel a “Santa”’s special ability until the end of the turn.
title: Hall

name: Travel Delay
quote: “Well, we do have a spare toboggan if you’re truly desperate.”
abilities: Stop a Character as it is being played: it goes back to that Player’s hang and cannot be played again this turn. This card cannot be played on a Player who has no Characters in their Movie.
title: Year

name: White Christmas
quote: “But what about the people who live in a desert?”
abilities: Target Movie gains +6 DS OR play to stop a SFX card as it is being played.
title: Jingle

name: Yes, Virginia There is a Santa Claus
quote: “See that guy in the red suit? No, next to the fireman.”
abilities: Search the Draw Pile for a “Santa” Character and place in your Movie. Then shuffle the unused cards back into the Draw Pile.
title: Santa

name: Yet Another “Christmas Carol” Adaptation
quote: “Picture this… Scrooge is an intergalactic arms dealer…”
abilities: Force any player to discard all cards from their Movie. Then, turn over cards from the Draw Pile and form a new Movie with the first Character and Location you reveal (if any). Then shuffle the unused cards back into the Draw Pile.
title: Holy

name: You Better Not Pout
quote: “Pouty faces piss Santa off!”
abilities: Add +3 AS to a Creature Attack OR If a player complains about being attacked, double the current AS of the Attack against them.
title: Workshop

name: You’ll Shoot Your Eye Out!
quote: “Everyone keeps saying that but how many kids do you see wearing eye patches?”
abilities: Remove any Character with a ‘Gun’ from play. OR reduce the DS of a Character to 0 until the end of the next turn.
title: Wonderful
